text: Thal is one of the 10 districts of the canton of Solothurn in Switzerland, found in the center of the canton. Thal contains the following municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area, km² Aedermannsdorf 534 12.88 Balsthal 5810 15.69 Gänsbrunnen 96 11.36 Herbetswil 585 16.35 Holderbank 663 7.79 Laupersdorf 1685 15.52 Matzendorf 1314 11.29 Mümliswil-Ramiswil 2542 35.48 Welschenrohr 1162 12.97 Total 14,391 139.33
title: Thal District
